meaning: box·ing〔báksiy│bɔks-〕 ▶ a boxing match 권투 시합<FONT colorred></FONT> 아마추어 선수의 체급 Light Flyweight(48kg 이하), Flyweight(51kg), Bantamweight(54kg), Featherweight(57kg), Lightweight(60kg), Light Welterweight(63.5kg), Welterweight(67kg), Light Middleweight(71kg), Middleweight(75kg), Light Heavyweight(81kg), Heavyweight(81kg 이상)
details:
box·ing1〔báksiy│bɔks-〕 n. [U] 권투, 복싱
▶ a boxing match 권투 시합
(NOTE) [아마추어 선수의 체급] Light Flyweight(48kg 이하), Flyweight(51kg), Bantamweight(54kg), Featherweight(57kg), Lightweight(60kg), Light Welterweight(63.5kg), Welterweight(67kg), Light Middleweight(71kg), Middleweight(75kg), Light Heavyweight(81kg), Heavyweight(81kg 이상)
